title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: On 6th October 1715, at the head of a littlecompany of gentlemen and armed servants, he joined Forster at Greenrig.

title: Stories of the Border Marches

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: With this purpose they held a meeting at a placecalled Greenrig, where Forster arrived with about twenty horse.
